product_name: Sony Action Cam Suction Cup Mount
long_description: The Sony Action Cam suction cup mount secures your Sony Action Cam waterproof case (sold separately), helping you to capture all the thrills of your adventures. Suction cup attaches easily and clings tenaciously to cars, kayak decks and other smooth, nonporous surfaces.
short_description: The Sony Action Cam suction cup mount secures your Sony Action Cam waterproof case (sold separately), helping you to capture all the thrills of your adventures.
